member.name: MIB_IFSTATUS
member.summary: TheMIB_IFSTATUS structure stores status information for a particular interface.

member.name: MIB_IFSTATUS.dwIfIndex
member.summary: The index that identifies the interface.

member.name: MIB_IFSTATUS.dwAdminStatus
member.summary: The administrative status of the interface, that is, whether the interface is administratively enabled or disabled.

member.name: MIB_IFSTATUS.dwOperationalStatus
member.summary: The operational status of the interface. This member can be one of the values defined in the enumeration defined in the Mprapip.h header file. See the ROUTER_CONNECTION_STATE enumeration for a list amd description of the possible operational states.

member.name: MIB_IFSTATUS.bMHbeatActive
member.summary: Specifies whether multicast heartbeat detection is enabled. A value of TRUE indicates that heartbeat detection is enabled. A value of FALSE indicates that heartbeat detection is disabled.

member.name: MIB_IFSTATUS.bMHbeatAlive
member.summary: Specifies whether the multicast heartbeat dead interval has been exceeded. A value of FALSE indicates that the interval has been exceeded. A value of TRUE indicates that the interval has not been exceeded.
